original_title: Shipibos Konibos: Hombres mono, Hombres peces
overview: Alejandrina show us her connection with fire, plants and animals. Meanwhile, she tell us the changes that massacres, terrorism and drug trafficking have provoked in her culture. Are the lumbermen or the miners going to end her cultural history?
title: Shipibos Konibos: Hombres mono, Hombres peces
